long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add loop controls to any HTML5 video.

Example: If you want to loop over a segment of a video, you can set the start and finish time stamps so that the video will repeat over the selected segment.

In addition, you'll be able to change the playback speed of the looping part of the video. 

This extension is great for musicians who want to practice with a video but be able to slow down and repeat certain sections of the video.
